item.title: NEM
item.description: score:21 Chances: Gold producers like Newmont Corp are raising bets on copper through deals and investments to gain influence over the commodity considered vital to the global energy transition. Risks: The recent settlement of exchange offers by Newmont Corporation indicates potential financial transactions and restructuring which may introduce some risk.
